Uses of Package
net.minecraftforge.event.village

  • Packages that use net.minecraftforge.event.village 
    Package Description
    net.minecraftforge.debug.village  
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.event.village used by net.minecraftforge.debug.village 
    Class and Description
    MerchantTradeOffersEvent
    MerchantTradeOffersEvent is fired when a list of villager trade offers is presented in IMerchant#getRecipes(EntityPlayer), allowing mods to modify trade offers depending on the player.
    VillageSiegeEvent
    VillageSiegeEvent is fired just before a zombie siege finds a successful location in VillageSiege#trySetupSiege, to give mods the chance to stop the siege.

    This event is Cancelable; canceling stops the siege.

    This event does not have a result.
